opptjening-intro-tekst: Here you will find a comprehensive overview of your pension earnings.
opptjening-inntekt-link-to-skatteetaten: The information on income comes from the tax assessment from the tax authorities.
beholdning-din-pensjonsbeholdning-i-folk: Your accumulated pension capital in the National Insurance Scheme
pensjonsbeholdning-forklart-tekst: You accumulate pension capital from the first year you have pensionable income. The assets increase each year based on the previous year's assets, pensionable income and any other accrual of pension rights, as well as an annual adjustment. The pension assets is used as a starting point for calculating the retirement pension you receive from NAV.
beholdning-and-pensjonspoeng-forklart: Accumulated pension capital and pension points explained
beholdning-and-pensjonspoeng-forklart-te: Du som er født i {{fodselsar}} tjener opp alderspensjon forholdsmessig etter både gamle og nye regler. Det betyr at du tjener opp pensjonsrettigheter både gjennom pensjonspoeng og en pensjonsbeholdning. Begge brukes i utregningen av pensjonen din.
beholdning-and-pensjonspoeng-forklart-il: Din fordeling etter nye og gamle regler kan illustreres slik:
beholdning-and-pensjonspoeng-forklart-le: Read about old and new rules in the National Insurance Scheme
opptjening-details-beholdning-i-starten-: Accumulated pension capital at the start of the year
opptjening-details-opptjening-basert-paa: Accumulated pension capital based on pensionable income* (kr {{grunnlag}})
Earnings based on compulsory military service* (kr {{grunnlag}})
opptjening-details-omsorgsopptjening: Pension rights for unpaid care work* (kr {{grunnlag}})
opptjening-details-okning-pga-reform-mer: * Until 1 May 2011, a separate wage growth factor has not been determined. The change in the National Insurance Scheme's basic amount (G) reflects the annual wage growth. The accumulated pension capital in 2010 is therefore adjusted with the increase in the basic amount (G) in 2010.
opptjening-details-lurer-du-paa-se-ofte-: Wondering what {{grunnlagType}} means in this context? See frequently asked questions further down.
opptjening-details-les-mer-om-hvordan-vi: Read about how we calculate the pension.
opptjening-details-pensjonspoeng-label: Pension points based on income in {{currentYear}}
opptjening-details-ingen-pensjonsbeholdn: There is no registered accumulated pension this year. This is because you did not have any income in {{year}}
inntekt-pensjonsgivende-inntekter-og-pen: Your pensionable income and pension points
chart-pensjonsbeholdningen-og-pensjonspo: Your Accumulated pension and pension points
pensjonskalkulator-lenke-title: How much pension will I get?
opptjening-flere-steder-title: You might have other forms of pension savings than the National Insurance Scheme
opptjening-flere-steder-forklart-title: There are three ways to save for pension:
opptjening-flere-steder-tjenestepensjon: Occupational pension (you and your your employer save together)
opptjening-flere-steder-folketrygden: National Insurance Scheme (the state saves for you)
opptjening-flere-steder-forklart: Every norwegian citizen gets pension from the National Insurance Scheme. If you are unsure if you have individual savings or occupational pension, you can for example check with your bank or ask your current or past employer.
opptjening-flere-steder-pensjonspoeng-te: Hvert år du har inntekt får du pensjonspoeng...TODO
opptjening-flere-steder-pensjonsbeholdni: Hvert år øker pensjonsbeholdningen din med 18.1 % av inntekten du hadde for to år siden...TODO
